title: Boston police identify worker killed in construction accident at Government Center parking garage - WCVB Boston
content:
1. Boston police identify worker killed in construction accident at Government Center parking garage  WCVB Boston
  2. Investigation Continues After Worker Killed During Partial Collapse At Government Center Parking Gar  CBS Boston
  3. Crane collapses into Boston parking garage, construction worker dead: reports  Fox News
  4. MBTA Green, Orange Line Service To Temporarily Change After Collapse At Government Center Parking Garage  CBS Boston
  5. Boston police identify victim of partial collapse at Government Center parking garage  WCVB Channel 5 Boston
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: The worker was inside a construction vehicle when he fell nine stories after the floor underneath him buckled and then collapsed.
